  <ButtonBar>
    <Button icon="caret-up" size="small">one</Button>

    <Button icon="caret-up" size="small">one </Button>
    <Button icon="caret-down" size="small">two</Button>
  </ButtonBar>

  <ButtonBar class="mt-4">
    <Button icon="caret-up" size="small">one </Button>
    <Button icon="info" size="small">two </Button>
    <Button icon="caret-down" size="small">three</Button>
    <Button icon="trash" size="small">four</Button>
  </ButtonBar>

  <ButtonBar class="mt-4">
    <Button :icon-only="true" icon="caret-up" label="up up up !" />
    <Button :icon-only="true" icon="caret-down" label="going down" />
  </ButtonBar>
</template>

/input/Date.story.vue:
<template>
  <InputTestContainer
    show-placeholder
    show-state
    v-slot="{ placeholder, valid, invalid, disabled }"
  >
    <label for="input-date" class="text-title"> Enter a date </label>
    <InputDate
      id="input-date"
      :placeholder="placeholder"
      :valid="valid"
      :invalid="invalid"
      :disabled="disabled"
    />
  </InputTestContainer>
</template>

/input/Search.story.vue:
<script setup lang="ts">
const searchValue = ref<string>("");
</script>

<template>
  <InputTestContainer
    show-placeholder
    show-state
    v-slot="{ placeholder, valid, invalid, disabled }"
  >
    <label for="search-input"> Search </label>
    <InputSearch
      v-model="searchValue"
      :placeholder="placeholder"
      :valid="valid"
      :invalid="invalid"
      :disabled="disabled"
      id="search-input"
    />
    value: {{ searchValue }}
  </InputTestContainer>
</template>
/input/Select.story.vue:
<script setup lang="ts">
const fieldValue = ref("");
const options = ["option 1", "option 2", "option 3", "option 4"];
</script>

<template>
  <InputTestContainer
    show-required
    show-placeholder
    show-state
    v-slot="{ placeholder, valid, invalid, disabled, required }"
  >
    <InputSelect
      id="story-input-1"
      :options="options"
      v-model="fieldValue"
      :required="required"
      :valid="valid"
      :invalid="invalid"
      :disabled="disabled"
      :placeholder="placeholder"
    />
  </InputTestContainer>
</template>
/input/String.story.vue:

</script>

<template>

      :valid="valid"
      :invalid="invalid"
      :disabled="disabled"
    />

/input/TextArea.story.vue:
<script setup lang="ts">
const id = "story-input-text-area-1";
const fieldValue = ref<string>("");
</script>

<template>
  <InputTestContainer
    show-placeholder
    show-state
    v-slot="{ placeholder, valid, invalid, disabled }"
  >
    <InputTextArea
      :id="id"
      v-model="fieldValue"
      :valid="valid"
      :invalid="invalid"
      :disabled="disabled"
      :placeholder="placeholder"
    />
  </InputTestContainer>
</template>
